resources.string: WELCOME TO THE MY KIDNEYS, MY HEALTH HANDBOOK.
This handbook provides information about detecting and slowing down kidney disease.
1 IN EVERY 10 ADULTS HAS SOME SIGN OF KIDNEY DISEASE SO YOU ARE NOT ALONE
Your health care team can help you monitor your kidney health and slow down the damage to your kidneys.
ACCESS RESOURCES, NETWORKS, AND ORGANISATIONS THAT GIVE YOU GUIDANCE AND PEER SUPPORT.
Kidney Health Australia has a community of people with kidney disease who you can connect with. The handbook also provides many resources and links to both information and s support network.
